7. Community Engagement: Housing developments can be designed to promote community engagement by incorporating shared spaces, such as community gardens, playgrounds, and meeting spaces. This can help to foster a sense of community and promote social interaction.

Overall, sustainable housing developments should be designed to minimize their environmental impact, promote health and well-being, and encourage sustainable living practices.

```
sudo -l
```

```
sudo apt-get update
```
